Title: High Food Prices
Tags: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, D3.js, Vercel
Description: A data visualization project exploring the potential causes behind the high prices of food today. Uses React and D3.js to create charts.

Title: Swiss Punk
Description: A one-page static website exploring the principles of New Wave typography in web design. Largely inspired by Wolfgang Weingart's works.

Title: Art Supplies Shop
Description: An art supplies inventory website that queries a database using PHP and SQL. Uses AJAX to display real-time information regarding the database.

Title: Artist Commissions
Description: A one-page static website showing an artist's mini portfolio, commission prices, and TOS. Uses Glightbox to create modal image galleries.
